Description.Text: Holiday Inn Southend is a modern 4-star hotel promising cosy accommodation and great service, next to the airport. Highlights include a stylish rooftop bar and a gym. Located beside London Southend Airport, and only 3km from the centre of Southend-on-Sea, the hotel is a fantastic base from which to explore the surrounding area. Guests can experience a seaside resort with a lively seafront and attractions such as Southend Cliff Railway and Southend Pier, which is the longest of its kind in the world. The hotel occupies a smart contemporary mid-rise with a shiny metallic exterior. Facilities include a fitness centre. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. The rooftop restaurant offers delicious national and international dishes in a sleek atmosphere complete with floor-to-ceiling windows, affording lovely views of the roundabout and airport. The bar serves a range of hot and cold beverages. Standard rooms are spacious and tastefully designed, featuring a bright modern decor. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, telephone and en-suite bathroom with shower. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
